page.title: 15CARAVAN PARKS IN FLEETWOOD
page.content: There are 4 caravan sites in our block, these are the Cala Gran,Selby Broadwater,and The Sportsman. The Cala Gran caravans vary in size and sleeping room,from 3 to 11 berth. The most expensive is the{BK_ {Blue_Bird}and it costs Â£8,900.The least expensive was about Â£5,500.When the site was opened in 1955, there were 200 caravans.There are now 739. On the Broadwaters site there are 450 caravans.It was opened in 1965 and there were about 150 caravans.You don't always have to book in advance, and it costs about Â£100 per week to hire.The Cala Gran is the only site to provide entertainment facilities e.g. Swimming pool,Tenpin Bowling etc. { Selby and The Sportsman are located Over Wyre at Staynall.They are all seasonally hired at approximately Â£300 a year.
